name: UNSTABLE
description:
This story begins with an unexpected encounter... An unknown messages you. Who is he and what are his motives? That's for you to decide.
Handle the unique manual controls in the 3D action runner with spaceship flight simulation to continue your adventure and get more messages from the unknown. Avoid asteroids or fracture them with a plasma laser weapon! Battle the boss! And enjoy the chaos!

Unique keyboard controls

Are designed to simulate the chaos of controlling a spaceship.
Each of the 4 colored zones is responsible for movement in a certain direction. Press different buttons in the colored zone to increase movement in a defined (shown by yellow arrows) direction.

Plasma laser weapon

To destroy the obstacles on your way to...

The boss

A real challenge of your skill.

Singleplayer

Just your spaceship, asteroids, and other surprises.

Energetic music

At each level, you will be accompanied by a new vigorous soundtrack.

Originally created in one week for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2 with the theme "Let There Be Chaos". This version includes more content, visual improvements, and optimizations.
